title: 3 and Out - Cam Signing: Classic Belichick, Give Cam Credit, Potential Biggest Losers; Raiders Empty Stadium Anxiety; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Cam Signing: Classic Belichick, Give Cam Credit, Potential Biggest Losers; Raiders Empty Stadium Anxiety; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, Middlekauff on why everything about the Cam Newton signing is classic Bill Belichick, why Cam deserves credit for signing a 'prove it' deal with the Patriots, and which teams could look the worst if Newton bounces back. He also explains why having no fans will hit the Raiders harder than most organizations, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
